Class CreationInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • creation.CreationInterface

  • public class CreationInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    This class displays output and get input from the user to create classes. he/she wants.

        public static Student setStudentMetadata(StudentDB studentDB)
        This method sets a Student's metadata based on user input when the user is creating student. student metadata: 1. studentID 2. student's full name
        Returns:
        newly created student

      • setCourseMetadata

        public static Course setCourseMetadata(CourseDB courseDB)
        This method sets a Course's metadata based on user input when the user is creating course. course metadata: 1. course code 2. course name 3. course maximum intake
        Returns:
        newly created course

      • setComponentMetadata

        public static ComponentWeightage setComponentMetadata(int componentIndex,
                                                      int componentsTotalWeightage)
        This method sets a Component's metadata based on user input when the user is creating course's component. component metadata: 1. component metadata 2. component weightage 3. whether component is standalone or an aggregate component
        Returns:
        newly created component of the right type

      • setSubcomponentMetadata

        Returns:
        newly created component of the right type
